title: Root People
description: A Brawlhalla-inspired game where you play as a root person and fight other root people. The map contains patches of grass which different heros can use to their advantage, each in their own way.
note: This was sadly an incomplete submission for the 2022 Global Game Jam due to time constraints. I plan to finish it in the future.

media.alt: Root person channeling an attack through the ground and leaving a thorn behind. (Kinda).
